prompt: A vertiginous, extreme low-angle worm's-eye view capturing a surreal, gravity-defying scene set within a claustrophobic urban canyon of towering, gritty tenement buildings that converge toward a central vanishing point in the overcast sky. Suspended in mid-air at the center of the composition is a male figure with the uploaded face as reference, portrayed in a state of levitation with arms outstretched in a relaxed, open gesture, wearing a dark, tailored long trench coat, button-down shirt, and dress trousers, with the perspective heavily foreshortening his body so his polished dress shoes are closest to the viewer and his head is furthest away. The atmosphere is thick with a dreamlike, "Inception"-style distortion as hundreds of black, rectangular debris fragments, boxes, and cuboid objects float chaotically around him, frozen in time against the pale, diffuse light of the cloudy sky. The lighting is soft and ambient with cool, desaturated blue and grey tones, emphasizing the textures of the weathered concrete, rusted metal fire escapes, and the fabric folds of the coat, rendered in hyper-realistic 8k resolution with raytraced reflections, sharp focus, and a cinematic, high-fidelity matte painting aesthetic
